actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution to amend the Standing Rules of the Senate by adding Rule XLIII, "Non-Disclosure Policy".

summary.text: Amends the Standing Rules of the Senate to add rule XLIII to prohibit any Senator, officer, staff member, or any Senate contractor from disclosing in any way the classified, confidential, or designated sensitive business or proceedings of the Senate, or any related information, documents, or material which are either classified, confidential, or designated as sensitive. Establishes penalties for violations of this rule.

titles.title: A resolution to amend the Standing Rules of the Senate by adding Rule XLIII, "Non-Disclosure Policy".
